dct_title_s: La sphere artificielle ou armilaire oblique, elevee sur lâ€™horizon a la latitude de Paris
dct_description_sm: Chez Desnos Geographe Ingenieur pour les Globes et Spheres.

Large armillary sphere surrounded by planetary illustrations, solar charts, and text. Includes 4 smaller maps (11.5 cm in diam.) in each corner; 2 celestial spheres at top, western and eastern hemisphere at bottom.
California shown as a labeled island (no place names) on the western hemisphere map.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
